name: GOD COMPLEXITY #2 - NEW LIFE Pt 1
description:
A series of visual experiments emerging from an attempt to simulate generative biological forms through geometry, collage and hand drawn animation. 

In this pair of linked animation loops, inspired in part by both @pointline_ & @arsiliath, a 3D animation of parametric geometry is put through a multi-stage process involving hand drawn animations, re-projections, animation collage and more.

The result is a hybrid form, containing elements of both natural biology and the rigidity and precision of computing.
